Name: RepeatBlock
Notes: A set of small blocks that start out as a normal platform and begin to move like a snake when stepped on by the player. However, if no path was assigned, it won't move at all. The total length of blocks will be (Obj_arg3 + 1) * Obj_arg2. Another RepeatBlock instance can be linked to it, which ensures that all Snake Blocks move once stepped on.

Obj_arg0.Name: Block Width
Obj_arg0.Description: The width of blocks to be created. Default is 2.

Obj_arg1.Name: Block Height
Obj_arg1.Description: The height of blocks to be created. Default is 2.

Obj_arg2.Name: Block Depth
Obj_arg2.Description: The depth of blocks to be created. Default is 2.

Obj_arg3.Name: Trail Factor
Obj_arg3.Description: Specifies how long the trail of blocks to be created will be. Default is 3.

Obj_arg4.Name: Movement Speed
Obj_arg4.Description: The rate at which the blocks move. Default is 5.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

Rail.Description: The optional path that it can move on.
